summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." The text indicates a requirement to respect robots.txt rules and acknowledges IP rate limiting, directing users to the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download for data access. This suggests a focus on the ethical and responsible use of online data collection and the potential impact on government websites and data access. The bill implicitly promotes ethical data scraping practices via adherence to industry standard directives, alongside redirecting users to the appropriate channels to access government data.
